meanings.definition: To remove a veil or covering from something
meanings.sent1: She will unveil the gift at the party.
meanings.sent2: The magician will unveil the surprise under the cloth.
meanings.sent3: The unveiling of the cake caused excitement among the guests.
meanings.sent4: As the clouds part, the sun unveils its brilliance.
meanings.sent5: With a dramatic flourish, he unveiled the painting for all to see.

meanings.definition: To reveal or make known something previously hidden or secret
meanings.sent1: The detective will unveil the truth behind the mystery.
meanings.sent2: The company will unveil its new product during the event.
meanings.sent3: The magician's attempt to unveil the rabbit ended in laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her smile unveiled her true feelings of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The artist's masterpiece unveiled a world of imagination.
